title: Bitter Sweet
description: What if you aren't who you thought you were. What if your world which you thought was save, crumbles in front of your eyes. What would you do? Danna the sarcastic, careless type of girl takes it worse than she expected. Forced to grow up on the worse circumstances and worse state of mind Danna has no other option. Traveling around the world to find herself is what she has to do but will her feelings for the mysterious boy of the green emeralds eyes distract her. Uncover secrets, lies and be surprised by book number one of the Bitter trilogy. Bitter Sweet.Photo credit: ShotHotspot.com / Foter / Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 Generic (CC BY 2.0)
author: Esmeralda Lorenzo
